updateRegistry

public void updateRegistry(org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology remoteOntologyRegistry,
                           org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology localOntologyRegistry)
Update local peer every "discoveryFrec" seconds i.e. within the exchangeinitiator process. Gets the list of all known peers from the remote peer and update the local registry with them i.e. if it is not known by the local peer it is added, if is alrady known the information is updated with the information from the remote peer.

Parameters:
remoteOntologyRegistry -
localOntologyRegistry -

updateLocalRegistry

public void updateLocalRegistry()

informerIP

public void informerIP(org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology remoteOntology,
                       org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.Ontology localOntology,
                       java.lang.String rendezvouzPeerIP)
AVERTISE TO REMOTE PEER (I.E. TO THE RENDEVZVOUS PEER) Every time the peer starts, informerIP runs to update local peer information in remote peer. e.g. inform to rendezvous peer. Add local peer to remote registry. If it exists already, the information is updated in the remote peer with the current local information. The local peer in the local registry is also updated with the current IP address in case the peer has dynamic IP

Parameters:
remoteOntology -
localOntology -

updateLocalIP

public void updateLocalIP()
